name: Warriors and Tactics
description:
Make every action point count in this highly tactical turn-based multiplayer battle arena game. Make strategic decisions, plan ahead and adjust your tactics to react to your opponent's moves. Wisely combine your units abilities to deal devastating damage and crush your enemy.

Created by:
Katarzyna Kubicz
Kacper Kowalczuk

Game created in 5 days for UE4 Summer Jam 2019
